name: GCHapticsLocality
desc: The location of one or more haptics actuators on a game controller.

items.name: static let `default`: GCHapticsLocality
items.desc: The default location of a haptics actuator on a game controller.

items.name: static let all: GCHapticsLocality
items.desc: All locations of haptics actuators on a game controller.

items.name: static let handles: GCHapticsLocality
items.desc: All handles on a game controller.

items.name: static let leftHandle: GCHapticsLocality
items.desc: The left handle on a game controller.

items.name: static let rightHandle: GCHapticsLocality
items.desc: The right handle on a game controller.

items.name: static let triggers: GCHapticsLocality
items.desc: All triggers on a game controller.

items.name: static let leftTrigger: GCHapticsLocality
items.desc: The left trigger on a game controller.

items.name: static let rightTrigger: GCHapticsLocality
items.desc: The right trigger on a game controller.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a locality structure with a string value.
